quotes.quote: Home is where you’re surrounded by other critters that care about you
quotes.author: Sandy Cheeks

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself and with a tiny pinch of magic, all your dreams can come true
quotes.author: Spongebob

quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to go deep inside ourselves to solve our problems
quotes.author: Patrick Star

quotes.quote: I’ll have you know that I stubbed by toe last week and only cried for 20 minutes
quotes.author: Spongebob

quotes.quote: It’s not always what you say that matters, sometimes it’s what you don’t say
quotes.author: Krabs

quotes.quote: I know of a place where you never get harmed. A magical place with magical charm. Indoors. Indoors. Indoors
quotes.author: Spongebob

quotes.quote: Good people don’t rip other people’s arms off
quotes.author: Spongebob

quotes.quote: Dumb people are always blissfully unaware of how dumb they really are…
quotes.author: Patrick Star

quotes.quote: You’re a man now, SpongeBob, and it’s time you started acting like one
quotes.author: Patrick Star

quotes.quote: That’s it mister! You just lost your brain privileges!
quotes.author: Plankton

quotes.quote: Excuse me, sir, but you’re sitting on my body, which is also my face
quotes.author: Spongebob

quotes.quote: This is not your average, everyday darkness. This is…ADVANCED darkness. Hey, if I close my eyes it doesn’t seem so dark
quotes.author: SpongeBob

quotes.quote: Too bad SpongeBob’s not here to enjoy Spongebob not being here
quotes.author: Squidward

quotes.quote: With imagination, you can be anything you want
quotes.author: Spongebob

quotes.quote: Well, it’s no secret that the best thing about a secret is secretly telling someone your secret, thereby adding another secret to their secret collection of secrets, secretly
quotes.author: SpongeBob

quotes.quote: You’ll never get what you want if you always let people step on you
quotes.author: Plankton

quotes.quote: Run Mr. Krabs! Run like you’re not in a coma!
quotes.author: Spongebob
